receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
receiptStandards.rule: Date of the expense must be clearly visible on the receipt. Invoices must include the date on which the expenditure was made

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
receiptStandards.rule: Expense type or description of goods/services purchased must be shown on the receipt

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
receiptStandards.rule: Total amount of the expense must be clearly displayed on the receipt

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
receiptStandards.rule: Name of the vendor or merchant must be visible on the receipt. Invoices must include the identity of the supplier/trade

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.rule: Invoices must include the purchaser details

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.rule: Invoices must include itemized description of each purchase/expenditure

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.rule: VAT amount must be listed clearly on the invoice if applicable

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.rule: The workers name and details should appear on invoices, not the Local Employer

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications
receiptStandards.rule: Invoice in the name of the employee or GoGlobal Europe GmbH, Prielmayerstr. 3 80335 Munich Allemagne. Invoices must use GoGlobal's details: GoGlobal Europe GmbH, Prielmayerstr. 3, 80335 Munich, Allemagne

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Business expenses related to workers completing their job will usually be tax exempt. Home office equipment, tools and supplies are considered tax exempt
IT tools including mobile phone subscription and home broadband are considered tax exempt
Business-related travel expenses including transportation costs, meals, hotels, exceptional and justified business costs are tax exempt

Mileage compensation for professional travel €0.428 per km as of 01.07.2023 until 30.06.2024, not taxable if does not exceed allowance State grants to its staff, valid only if number of kilometres driven annually is not abnormally high (maximum 24,000 km/year)
Travel from work to home: amount of reimbursement may not exceed sum of EUR 0.15 per kilometer of distance, calculated on basis of outward and return distances
Entertainment expenses are considered non-tax exempt including nightclubs, cocktail lounges, theaters, country clubs, golf and athletic clubs, sporting events, hunting and fishing

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Business purpose must be established and clearly documented for all expenses

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Documents must be actual tax receipts or invoices; booking confirmations will not suffice

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Online copies are sufficient, a hard copy is not required

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Employee's line manager approval required before payroll cutoff date

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Itemized expense reports required along with clear receipts
For foreign currency expenses, convert amount to local currency and include currency and exchange rate used (e.g., https://www.xe.com)
For mileage reimbursements, use GoGlobal mileage log report, include To and From locations, distance travelled and applicable mileage rates as per the log
For business related travel, employee must be able to prove by means of invoices, notes, receipts, etc. that the number of kilometres and the amount of car expenses are correct
Go Global- An A1 certificate is required when travelling with an extra costs

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Any personal information not required for reimbursement purposes should be removed before submission

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses must be pre-approved by Line Manager
Business meals: When holding business lunch meeting a list of all participants (name and company) must be provided, including person hosting the event

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Local currency should be used on the expense reimbursement claim

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses will be paid out 1 to 3 days after the monthly payroll run and will not be reflected in the worker's pay slip

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses paid with the monthly payroll – last business day of the month

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office_supplies, Equipment, Training, Telecommunications, Mileage, Transportation
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses will be paid out towards the end of the month. All approved expenses will be paid as NET to the employee and grossed up if they are not tax-free
